divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were traveling south on I-15 about 15 miles north of EscondidoCA at approximately 1059 pm I saw a red star like object traveling very fastsideways and slightly upward in the sky. No other stars were visable thatnight. It lasted for about 3 seconds and then disapeared.
